UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity of Bac7 fragments against drug-resistant clinical isolates.
Literature.Author: Benincasa M, Scocchi M, Podda E, Skerlavaj B, Dolzani L, Gennaro R

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>128µM),Escherichia coli ML-35(MIC=>128µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>128µM),Serratia marcescens ATCC 8100(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>128µM)
